effect.full: This Pokémon cannot be poisoned. This includes bad poison. If a Pokémon is poisoned and acquires this ability, its poison is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

description.diamond-pearl: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.
